Chasing UFOs
programme.desc: Since 1993 UFO sightings have haunted some residents of Phoenix, Arizona. Reports from hundreds of people all note seeing a triangular formation of lights in the sky. Ryder, Ben, and James start by watching the video footage first captured in 1993 that also highlights a similar shaped item floating above. The man who caught the sighting on video, Terry Connet, comes forward to explain just how enormous and eerily silent the object was. After the original Phoenix Lights incident, the military stated that it was simply dropped flairs from a nearby Air Force Base, others believe it was skydivers.

programme.title: Chasing UFOs
programme.desc: Before NASA's shuttle program shut down, residents in Florida reported a series of strange glowing orbs trailing the shuttle's launch into space. Ryder, Ben, and James launch a daring mission around Kennedy Space Center to investigate if aliens are watching earth from above. The team's determination to conclude if aliens are spying on our world involves braving swamps infested with reptiles and even evading an oncoming boat.

programme.title: Breakthrough
programme.desc: The human brain is the most complex object in the known universe. After millennia of speculation about what goes on inside our heads, we now have the tools to explore its deepest reaches. These tools are leading to significant discoveries: breakthroughs that may shed light on the mystery of consciousness, free thousands from comas and afflictions such as epilepsy, and offer relief to people haunted by severe trauma.

programme.title: Breakthrough
programme.desc: Humankind has searched for the fountain of youth since the beginning of recorded history. Scientific advancements have increased life expectancy, but now that living into the 80s is commonplace, we have a new problem. We need to extend not just lifespan, but healthspan. A pioneering band of scientists now believe they have the knowledge to target and slow the mechanisms of aging.

programme.title: Evacuate Earth
programme.desc: Is a "zombie apocalypse" simply a concept of fiction or could an infectious disease REALLY turn humanity into a race of vicious, seething monsters? The truth just might shock you! NGC examines one all too real scenario -- a pandemic caused by a mutated rabies virus. Experts from the fields of medicine, biology and the social sciences explain what could happen if humanity faced a deadly contagion for which there was is no cure. Through stunning dramatizations, watch as the virus makes its way from the depths of the ocean to every corner of the Earth turning humans and animals alike into individual vehicles of brutal destruction.

programme.title: Evacuate Earth
programme.desc: Do amazing breakthroughs in technology bring terrifying new levels of danger to humanity? We this deadly question by exploring some of the dangers posed by one of the most promising new technologies: nano-robotics. This one-houir program postulates an environmental clean-up robot the size of a molecule, which is hacked by a rogue engineer and turned into a spreading, flesh-consuming monster. In this scenario, it becomes clear that the only technology fit to fight back against this nano-robot is another robot a near-microscopic nano-aircraft built by the American military. The nano-weapon does handle the initial threat but when it spins out of control and begins attacking cities around the world, the cure becomes more deadly and world-threatening than the disease. Only by resorting to an improvised weapon radar used to fuse and melt the tiny inner workings of these military robots does humanity escape this gruesome fate.

programme.title: Science of Stupid
programme.desc: The show that combines cold hard science with some of the craziest, most spectacular and painful user generated clips ever recorded is back for a third season. Richard Hammond introduces a host of new mishaps featuring brave, if misguided individuals from around the world and then explains the science behind their failure and humiliation with the use of bespoke animations and super slo-mo cinematography. In this episode we learn just how many ways there are to embarrass, injure and humiliate yourself when cliff diving, swinging a sledgehammer and riding a motorised scooter.

programme.title: Made in a Day
programme.desc: In the series exploring cutting-edge manufacturing in America, the new balance flagship factory in Lawrence, Massachusetts is featured. They are one of the few big brand sneaker companies still making their shoes in America. A combination of high-tech machinery, hand crafting skills and global logistics come together to make and distribute their best-selling sneaker and bring it to the world.

programme.title: Made in a Day
programme.desc: America's most famous liquor started with humble beginnings, 150 years ago, in Lynchburg, Tennessee . This same distillery now makes over 120 million bottles a year of one of the world's most beloved brews. From the grains that turn in to mash, the distilling process and the charcoal mellowing and barrel storage, this is the story of how Jack Daniels is made and competes in a whisky market worth 800 billion dollars a year.

programme.title: Mega Breakdown
programme.desc: A team of experts mobilizes to demolish, excavate and recycle a 25,000 ton dam built of concrete and steel. The pressure is on: They have just half the time needed to complete the job. Worse yet, their biggest challenge stands behind the old dam – One million cubic yards of boulders, gravel, and sand that the river has stacked against it for nearly a century. To remove this blockade, the team gambles on a radical, dangerous plan that's never been tried before: Turning the energy of a perfect storm against the debris. If they are not successful, a generation of endangered salmon returning to spawn may be wiped out.

programme.title: Mega Breakdown
programme.desc: Railroads are the backbone of American industry. 170,000 miles of track crisscross the country from coast to coast, moving two million billion tons of freight nationally every year. But nothing lasts forever, and that includes a couple of 180-ton locomotives. Their engine technology is inefficient – so they're headed for the scrap dealer where they'll be cut down and cannibalized. Any salvageable parts must come out intact for resale, while and leftover metals – like steel and copper – will be cut up, melted down, and ultimately reformed into new products. In this business, nothing goes to waste. Get an inside look at the unknown world of scrap, where locomotives go to die…and be reborn.

programme.title: 1989: The Year That Made Us
programme.desc: The War on Terror began in 2001, but the cause of this 17-year conflict can be traced back to 1989. In this episode of National Geographic's insightful 6-part series, former Secretary of State James Baker and retired General David Petraeus shed new light on the early birth of Islamic extremism in Afghanistan, and examine America's complex, on-going battle against this ever-changing ideological enemy that knows no borders.

programme.title: 1989: The Year That Made Us
programme.desc: NatGeo's 6-part series "1989," continues with a fascinating look at the rise of tabloid journalism in the late 80's. The sensational programs put politics aside, making outrageous stories of sex, scandal and celebrity their primary beat. Larry King, Connie Chung and Maury Povich provide their unique, first-hand perspectives, revealing how this unapologetic new format blurred the lines of what was considered news, forever.

programme.title: 1989: The Year That Made Us
programme.desc: What do Bart Simpson, Batman and the Little Mermaid have in common? They all became huge stars in 1989, a year that shaped Hollywood as we know it today. In this episode of Nat Geo's 6-part series, television ad film icons James Brooks and Peter Guber peel back the curtain on the world of entertainment. They reveal how the overnight success of these three characters turned the old show business into the multifaceted modern industry it is today.

programme.title: 1989: The Year That Made Us
programme.desc: Chuck D and Arsenio Hall discuss the pop culture revolution of 1989 that raised our collective social consciousness. Spike Lee's powerful film Do the Right Thing made a lasting impact, Public Enemy's provocative lyrics transformed Hip Hop and Arsenio Hall created a platform for a generation of stars previously ignored by late night TV. The cultural and political events of the year helped awaken mainstream audiences to the black experience.

programme.title: The '90s: The Decade That Connected Us
programme.desc: The '90s were a decade of highs and lows.Bill Clinton swept into the United States Presidential office on the promise of change; viewers made new "Friends"; civil war rocked Rwanda; a notorious Colombian drug lord was taken down, and MTV's "The Real World" changed the television programming landscape.It was a time when technology accelerated us into our digital future, and a time when billionaires were created faster than ever before.With a star-studded cast of actors, eyewitnesses, politicians and celebrity interviewees, The 90s: The Decade That Connected Us tells the story of 10 years before boom turned into bust; 10 years when the Web was wide open; 10 years before global terror hit hard.

programme.title: The '90s: The Decade That Connected Us
programme.desc: The '90s were a decade of highs and lows.Bill Clinton swept into the United States Presidential office on the promise of change; viewers made new "Friends"; civil war rocked Rwanda; a notorious Colombian drug lord was taken down, and MTV's "The Real World" changed the television programming landscape.It was a time when technology accelerated us into our digital future, and a time when billionaires were created faster than ever before.With a star-studded cast of actors, eyewitnesses, politicians and celebrity interviewees, The 90s: The Decade That Connected Us tells the story of 10 years before boom turned into bust; 10 years when the Web was wide open; 10 years before global terror hit hard.

programme.title: Access 360° World Heritage
programme.desc: There's a special place in the heart of the Amazon rainforest with ecosystems so unique and biodiversity so rich the UN have declared it a World Heritage Site. But the threats of climate change are looming. If nobody takes action this pristine wilderness could wither in decades and the effects would be devastating, not only here but across the planet. Now a team of four courageous people have devoted their lives to the protection of this corner of rainforest. Braving an unforgiving jungle and extreme weather, they give us 360 access into the challenges, the setbacks and the successes of their everyday work.

programme.title: Access 360° World Heritage
programme.desc: Could the Taj Mahal be in imminent danger? It is one of the grandest works of architecture on the planet. But these days, it has plenty of critics. They insist that this monument to undying love is at risk of collapsing into the river that runs beside it. But the conservators who guard it dispute the claims. We follow the controversy as two groups examine the Taj's stability. The over 360-year-old monument is under serious pressure from the effects of climate change, pollution and mass tourism. After the Mumbai attacks, security is also a serious concern. But could the Taj collapse?

programme.title: Car Sos Special: 7 Day Challenge
programme.desc: In the first of a two part Car SOS special Tim and Fuzz attempt to restore a Series 2 Land Rover in 7 days. Shot in front of a live studio audience at the British Motor Museum Car SOS goes into the unknown, not only giving themselves an almost impossible restoration schedule but inviting special guest Ross Kemp to join in the mechanical mayhem. In this episode, the clock starts on the record breaking restoration of a 1959 series 2 Land Rover.

programme.title: Car S.O.S.
programme.desc: Tim Shaw, a car enthusiast and TV presenter teams up with master mechanic Fuzz Townshend to rescue rusty old cars and classic vehicles from their former neglected lives. People can nominate a relative or friend without them knowing if they've been unable to restore the car themselves for any reason from medical issues to financial problems. A team of experts work hard to restore the vehicles to their former glory and once they have been revamped the owner is surprised with a reunion, usually at a staged event organised by Tim Shaw.

programme.title: Car S.O.S.
programme.desc: Tim Shaw, a car enthusiast and TV presenter teams up with master mechanic Fuzz Townshend to rescue rusty old cars and classic vehicles from their former neglected lives. People can nominate a relative or friend without them knowing if they've been unable to restore the car themselves for any reason from medical issues to financial problems. A team of experts work hard to restore the vehicles to their former glory and once they have been revamped the owner is surprised with a reunion, usually at a staged event organised by Tim Shaw.

programme.title: Ultimate Supercar
programme.desc: A must see for petrolheads and connoisseurs, this series takes the viewer behind the scenes at some of the most legendary automobile manufacturers on the planet to reveal how their supercars are designed, engineered and constructed. From the DBS Superleggera of the last truly independent marque, Aston Marton, to Ferrari's best-selling Portofino and from rapper's favourite, the Bentley Continental GT. to the over-the-top Lamborghini Aventador SVJ, we learn what makes these beautiful machines unique and how it is the small, individual engineering secrets that make all the difference and ensure their mythical status and economic success.

programme.title: Ultimate Supercar
programme.desc: A must see for petrolheads and connoisseurs, this series takes the viewer behind the scenes at some of the most legendary automobile manufacturers on the planet to reveal how their supercars are designed, engineered and constructed. From the DBS Superleggera of the last truly independent marque, Aston Marton, to Ferrari's best-selling Portofino and from rapper's favourite, the Bentley Continental GT. to the over-the-top Lamborghini Aventador SVJ, we learn what makes these beautiful machines unique and how it is the small, individual engineering secrets that make all the difference and ensure their mythical status and economic success.

programme.title: Primal Survivor
programme.desc: Hazen travels to the Malay Peninsula in search of the Mani tribe. These ancient hunter gatherers use traditional blowguns armed with poison tipped darts. Hazen is keen to join a hunt but first he must prove he's up to the challenge by surviving alone in this daunting wilderness. Home to vertical rock cliffs, wild jungle elephents and even tigers, it's a dangerous envoironment where every step could be your last.

programme.title: Primal Survivor
programme.desc: Hazen travels to Papua New Guinea to meet the Mirr tribe. These hunter gatherers are famed for their rich culture and are fiercely protective of their land and people. Hazen is keen to attend a tribal wedding, but first has to prove himself worthy by heading out into the wilderness alone. He's tasked with bringing back three items for the groom – all essential for the tribal nuptials. But the hostile terrain proves challenging and time is against him.

programme.title: Gordon Ramsay: Uncharted
programme.desc: This season Gordon is on culinary mission as he dives, fishes and forages across the world. From hand-catching rattlesnakes in Texas, to fighting waves hunting for barnacles in Portugal, Ramsay's adventure takes him: lobstering in Maine; moonshining in the Smokey Mountains; rappelling for shrimp in Puerto Rico; bread making in Iceland's volcanic sands; wrestling with conga eels in Croatia; and scaling cliffs for butterworms and honey ants in Mexico.

programme.title: Gordon Ramsay: Uncharted
programme.desc: Chef Ramsay journeys to Louisiana to learn the secrets of Cajun cooking. He meets Eric Cook -- ex-Marine turned celebrated chef -- who sends him off to get lost in the marsh and see what he comes back with. In his quest, Ramsay faces down dangerous and delicious creatures from deep in the swamps to the middle of the Gulf of Mexico. Does he rise to the challenge or do his skills end at "End of the World?"

programme.title: Situation critical
programme.desc: Apollo 13 is on its way to the moon for the most challenging of lunar missions yet. As Swigert performs a normal housekeeping chore of stirring the oxygen tanks, he unwittingly triggers a catastrophic explosion. How will Mission Control get Apollo 13 home? For how long will the lunar module engine work, just how much food and water does the crew have, and how will they cope with the freezer-like conditions?

programme.title: SpongeBob Squarepants
programme.desc: SpongeBob SquarePants is a cartoon series starring the yellow sea spong Spongebob who lives deep in the ocean in the underwater town called Bikini Bottom. Together with his buddy the pink starfish Patrick, he experiences the craziest and most exciting adventures. Spongebob has a very energetic and optimistic character and works as a chef in restaurant "The Krusty Krab" where he makes the best burgers of the bottom of the sea.

programme.title: SpongeBob Squarepants
programme.desc: SpongeBob SquarePants is a cartoon series starring the yellow sea spong Spongebob who lives deep in the ocean in the underwater town called Bikini Bottom. Together with his buddy the pink starfish Patrick, he experiences the craziest and most exciting adventures. Spongebob has a very energetic and optimistic character and works as a chef in restaurant "The Krusty Krab" where he makes the best burgers of the bottom of the sea.

programme.title: School of Rock
programme.desc: School of Rock is an American musical-comedy television series based on the 2003 film of the same name. A group of teenagers of the prestigious american school have a pretty predictable life, until one day totally changes everything. Once they get a substitute teacher Dewey Finn and he instructs Tomika, Freddy, Summer, Zack and Lawrence in the art of rock and roll. Mr Finn has his own view on the lesson structure and he gets across to the students easily so they become his huge fans at once. Thanks to Mr Finn the teens create a rock band and learn to play different instruments. Rock helps them to realize that in order to become successful they must learn how to work as a team, merge into one and leave any signs of egoistic behavior behind.

programme.title: Game Shakers
programme.desc: Game Shakers revolves around two seventh graders, Babe and Kenzie, who live and go to school in Brooklyn, New York. Once they create a video game called "Sky Whale" as part of their school science project. The two friends have no idea that their game will become very popular and make a fortune. Everything goes smoothly until famous rapper Double G wants to sue them for illegal use of his song in the game. The girls decide to make an offer he can't refuse- business partnership, they also offer his son Triple G to become a video game consultant.

programme.title: The Fairly OddParents
programme.desc: The Fairly OddParents tells about the ten year old boy Timmy that lives in the fictional town Dimmsdale where he has a hard time. His life is constantly miserable because his parents are rarely home, he is babysat by Vicky, a 16-year-old torturous babysitter, he is bullied daily, and is tormented by his teacher, Mr. Crocker. But everything changes when he receives two fairy godparents: Cosmo, his wife Wanda, and later their son, Poof. Timmy learns that his fairy godparents are capable of granting him any wish he wants within certain limits. However, Timmy's immature nature causes him to sometimes ask for wishes that unintentionally result in disaster.

programme.title: 44 Cats
programme.desc: 44 Cats is an Italian preschool animated television series about four kittens who create a musical group called the Buffycats. Lampo is the lead singer and guitarist, Milady is the bassist, Pilou is the drummer and Meatball is the keyboard player. The kittens live in the house of Granny Pina where they meet 40 other cats. Granny likes to cook her magic pasta that gives the Buffycats their special powers. Her old garage is turned into a club, where the kittens give concerts and polish up their musical talents. They are always enthusiastic and optimistic, ready to give a helping hand to other cats and kittens. The 44 Cats is inspired by a very popular Italian kids song, 44 Cats which became famous on children's song festival Zecchino d'Oro in 1968.

programme.title: Blue's Clues & You
programme.desc: It's a special nighttime game of Blue's Clues to figure out what Blue wants to do for her first pajama party. While we play Blue's Clues we learn about why it gets dark and light outside and which animals prefer the nighttime.

programme.title: Butterbean's Cafe
programme.desc: The owner of Butterbean's Cafe in the magical land of Puddlebrook is fairy Butterbean. Her cafe is a very comfortable and warm place, popular for its various dishes- cakes, pancakes, cookies, banana bread, salads cooked by herself, her friends Poppy, Dazzle, Jasper and her sister Poppy. Friends use extraordinary cooking appliances and a magic secret ingredient, that is why everything is so special and yummy. Their jealous rival is Ms. Marmalady, things are not going great at her cafe so she desperately wants to put Butterbean out of business. But true friendship and friends' support can conquer evil.

programme.title: Barbapapa – One Big Happy Family!
programme.desc: The Barbabies win a touchpad. They all want to use it and snaffle it one after another. Barbazoo collects photos of moustached celebrities. Unfortunately, it's impossible to find the last one: Charles Horseshoe-Furlip. He suspects a conspiracy...

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington
programme.desc: The Adventures of Paddington is a new version of a familiar bear. It's a heartwarming show about being curious, being good to others, and being part of a loving family. Each 11 minute episode will take a lead from Michael Bond's original books and, with the spirit of the new Paddington movies, tell brand new Paddington stories in an exciting new animated form. The show will appeal to both children and adults alike – adults will recognise the Paddington they know and love, and young children will discover him for the first time. The show is heavily influenced by the Paddington Feature Films but a key difference is the characters especially the Brown family have been aged down, more of a young family starting out than the comfortable middle aged ones we see in the films.

programme.title: Paw Patrol
programme.desc: Follow Ryder and his team of trusty side-pups as they try their best to help keep Adventure Bay safe from mayhem and mischief. Alongside his service pups Marshall, Rubble, Chase, Zuma, Rocky and Skye, ten-year-old Ryder proudly leads the Paw Patrol team as they confront their rivals over in the neighbouring town of Foggy Bottom. Under the watch of an arrogant Mayor Humdinger, Foggy Bottom's local crew of pesky kitties love nothing more than eating candy and stirring up a little trouble for Ryder and his friends. Lucky for the citizens of Adventure Bay, "no job is too big and no pup is too small" for the team to handle, and whether navigating sea, land or sky, these mighty pups are ready to go, go, go!

programme.title: Alvinnn!!! And The Chipmunks
programme.desc: The series is an animated comedy about a single father named David Seville, who is raising three chipmunks. He can lose his patience sometimes, causing him to say ALVINNN!!! . The series takes place in modern times and discusses modern topics such as Dave's technology issues and school bullying. Others are parents embarrassing kids and parents needing dates.

programme.title: It's Pony
programme.desc: Pony's constant distractions threaten to derail Annie's part of a science project Gerry is counting on her to do. On a trip to the bookstore, Annie and Pony discover the comfiest chair in the world that also may have superpowers.

programme.title: It's Pony
programme.desc: A normal girl's life is made extraordinary by her best friend – an unpredictable, outrageous, and hilarious talking pony. No matter the complications he causes, Annie knows that everything is better when Pony is around.

programme.title: City Adventures
programme.desc: Welcome to LEGO City. A modern metropolis filled with the fiercest firefighters, the cream of the crop cops, and so many BLOCKHEADS. Every citizen will assemble together for the most awesomely awesome adventures.

programme.title: The Loud House
programme.desc: In this crowded and chaotic household, Lincoln Loud is the only boy among his ten sisters. With eleven children under one roof, things get a little bit crazy sometimes, to say the least. This children's cartoon is fun and light-hearted, and Clyde, Lincoln's best friend, only adds to that. Clyde is an only child by contrast, and is jealous of Lincoln's abundance of siblings. Clyde also has a massive crush on Lori, who is Lincoln's oldest sister. However, she has a boyfriend, Bobby. Bobby, although not being particularly intelligent, has several different jobs, ranging from life guard, to security at a shopping centre.

programme.title: The Loud House
programme.desc: Ever wonder what it's like to grow up in a big family? Eleven-year-old Lincoln Loud gives viewers an inside look at how to survive the chaos of a huge household, especially as the only boy with ten sisters!

programme.title: The Loud House
programme.desc: To get Lily to stop crying the kids give her an old singing toy from the attic but it quickly drives them crazy. Dad declares war on the kids' devices so they decide to show Dad how great electronics and the internet are.

programme.title: The Casagrandes
programme.desc: Family-orientated cartoon for kids. Ronnie Anne Santiago, her big brother Bobby and their mum have recently moved to Great Lakes City and are now getting used to life in this busy, and sometimes chaotic, new town. Here in the big city they meet the Casagrandes – their extended family made up of grandparents, aunt, uncle, cousins and their pets. Along with a bunch of friends they all live as one big happy family. Skateboarding Ronnie Anne also starts to explore what their new hometown has to offer. Meanwhile, Bobby helps his grandfather Hector working in the family store where they meet lots of interesting characters from the neighbourhood.

Meanwhile, Bobby helps his grandfather Hector working in the family store where they meet lots of interesting characters from the neighbourhood.

programme.title: The Thundermans
programme.desc: Phoebe and Max Thunderman are 14-year-old twins who share a house, a school, a birthday, and a set of superpowers courtesy of their super-powered parents. Yet somehow, in the cosmic game of genetic roulette, Phoebe popped out of the womb good, while Max came out evil. This super-sibling rivalry, coupled with the typical school/family issues faced by your average kid ultimately leads to a series of hilarious situations.

Yet somehow, in the cosmic game of genetic roulette, Phoebe popped out of the womb good, while Max came out evil. This super-sibling rivalry, coupled with the typical school/family issues faced by your average kid ultimately leads to a series of hilarious situations.

programme.title: Henry Danger
programme.desc: Henry Danger is a story about adventures of a 13-year-old Henry Hart who is lucky to become a helpmate of a super hero Captain Man. This is a real dream job of every teen. The newbie is getting paid for fighting against crime and helping to save the world. Brave Henry must hide his job from his family and friends and it is not that simple, but nothing can stop him from being a true crime-fighter. Henry himself wants to become a super hero one day, that is why he is constantly learning from Captain Man and is not scared of any hardships on the way to his dream.

programme.title: Danger Force
programme.desc: This fun spin-off of Henry Danger is set in the Swellview Academy for the Gifted and follows the adventures of four young friends. Chapa, Miles, Bose and Mika were ordinary kids, until they discovered they have superpowers. They are recruited by Captain Man to become his new crime-fighting crew, and protect the city of Swellview from various villains. But before that Captain Man must teach them how to control their superpowers, as well as to how to work as a team, using Schwoz as his helper.

programme.title: Tyler Perry's Young Dylan
programme.desc: Hilarious television series, created by Tyler Perry, that follows the life and adventures of a street-smart kid and aspiring hip-hop artist Young Dylan. When Dylan's grandmother Viola realizes that raising her grandson is too much to take on, she decides to send him to live indefinitely with her wealthy son Myles Wilson, his wife Yasmine and their two kids Rebecca and Charlie. Everyone will have to adapt to their ''new normal'', and they will get themselves in lots of hilarious situations along the way. Dylan will teach his cousins about ''swag'' and street smarts, but he will soon learn that even rappers have rules in the Wilson house.

programme.title: Tyler Perry's Young Dylan
programme.desc: Young Dylan's grandmother decides to send him to live indefinitely with her affluent son's family. The Wilson family household is soon turned upside down as lifestyles clash between aspiring hip hop star and his straight-laced cousins.

programme.title: Nicky, Ricky, Dicky & Dawn
programme.desc: Nicky, Ricky, Dicky and Dawn are quadruplets with only two things in common: their birthday and parents. This dynamic foursome battle sibling rivalry at every turn, but in the end when they are together, nothing can stop them.

programme.title: The Thundermans
programme.desc: Entertaining comedy series that follows the out-of-this-world adventures of the Thundermans, a family that has superpowers but try to live normal lives in the town of Hiddenville. The parents, Hank and Barb, used to be "Thunder Man" and "Electress", until they decided to retire and move to suburbs, in an attempt to live a normal life with their kids- ''Thunder Twins'' Phoebe, whose superpowers include telekinesis, heat breath and freeze breath and Max, who has the same powers but wants to become a super-villain, Billy who is super fast, Nora, who has laser eyes and Chloe, whose superpower is teleportation.

programme.title: The Loud House
programme.desc: Ever wonder what it's like to grow up in a big family? Eleven-year-old Lincoln Loud gives viewers an inside look at how to survive the chaos of a huge household, especially as the only boy with ten sisters!

programme.title: The Loud House
programme.desc: To get Lily to stop crying the kids give her an old singing toy from the attic but it quickly drives them crazy. Dad declares war on the kids' devices so they decide to show Dad how great electronics and the internet are.

programme.title: The Loud House
programme.desc: In this crowded and chaotic household, Lincoln Loud is the only boy among his ten sisters. With eleven children under one roof, things get a little bit crazy sometimes, to say the least. This children's cartoon is fun and light-hearted, and Clyde, Lincoln's best friend, only adds to that. Clyde is an only child by contrast, and is jealous of Lincoln's abundance of siblings. Clyde also has a massive crush on Lori, who is Lincoln's oldest sister. However, she has a boyfriend, Bobby. Bobby, although not being particularly intelligent, has several different jobs, ranging from life guard, to security at a shopping centre.

programme.title: Парижские тайны
programme.desc: Исторический триллер о загадочных убийствах в самом романтичном городе мира. Париж, конец XIX века. По городу прокатывается серия загадочных убийств в самых известных и культурно значимых местах города: кабаре Мулен Руж, Парижская опера, Эйфелева башня… Смотрите детективный сериал с французским колоритом.

programme.title: Euronews
programme.desc: Свежие репортажи из разных уголков Европы помогут зрителям Первого канала ориентироваться в водовороте бурной европейской жизни

programme.title: Реальная мистика
programme.desc: Огромному количеству людей приходилось сталкиваться с проявлением необъяснимого и сверхъестественного, однако в большинстве случаев найти рациональный ответ на произошедшую ситуацию не удавалось никому. Докудрама "Реальная мистика" ставит перед собой амбициозную задачу: разгадать, на первый взгляд, абсолютно загадочные и мистические явления. Герои "Реальной мистики" – простые зрители, столкнувшиеся с необъяснимым в своей жизни. Ведущий документального реалити актер Андрей Дебрин вместе с командой помощников будет проводить расследование самых запутанных историй, которые происходят в мире: НЛО, гадания, привороты, аномальные зоны и многим другим и выяснят, что на самом деле за ними стоит.

programme.title: Участковый
programme.desc: "Новоселки" – сленговое название микрорайона на окраине столицы, в котором процветает преступность. Местные жители так привыкли к такому положению вещей, что кажется, уже никто и никогда не сможет заставить их поверить в силы правосудия. Но жизнь микрорайона меняется с приездом нового участкового Сергея Громова, бывшего старшего следователя убойного отдела... Сергей не любит вспоминать о своем прошлом, но работа оперативника научила его мгновенно оценивать ситуацию и принимать решения. Он не будет разгадывать ребусы свершившихся злодеяний, его задача – работа на опережение преступников…

programme.title: Морские дьяволы. Смерч
programme.desc: Их называют "морскими дьяволами", хотя по праву их можно считать рыцарями трех стихий: они действуют на земле, в воде и в воздухе. Захватывающий боевик "Морские дьяволы" посвящен спецназовцам ВМФ России, всем боевым пловцам — тем, кто является элитой наших вооруженных сил. Все имена и боевые псевдонимы в сериале вымышлены, отряд под таким названием никогда не существовал, но такие подразделения существуют на самом деле, и их подвигами страна вправе гордиться!

programme.title: Улетное видео по-русски
programme.desc: Улетное видео по-русски – это сборник самых смешных и невероятных видео со всей планеты. В каждом выпуске представлены смешные падения людей, а также глупые поступки и нелепые ситуации в которые они попадают. Все серии улетного видео также не обошлись без обаятельных и неповторимых животных. Лучшее видео с любимыми котиками, смешным собаками и сотнями представителей дикой и домашней фауны, также собраны в одной передаче. Если смотреть улетное видео по-русски, то можно смело забыть о плохом настроении, ведь герои передачи заставят рассмеяться даже самого грустного зрителя. Все серии шоу пропитаны искрометным юмором, смешными шутками и невероятными кадрами. Помимо этого в шоу собраны редкие записи природных катаклизмов, сумасшедших везений и еще много-много все.

programme.title: Пападос-шоу
programme.desc: Юмористическая телепрограмма подарит телезрителям массу эмоций — от восторга до испуга. В каждом выпуске телешоу "Пападос шоу" собраны розыгрыши, снятые скрытой камерой в разных странах мира. Это нестандартные ситуации, вызывающие неожиданную реакцию прохожих. Камера фиксирует, как реагируют люди разного возраста на унитаз или душевую кабину в лифте, труп на улице или пленника в багажнике машины. Ведущие предлагают повторить пранки, а автор лучшего видео может получить приз от программы.

programme.title: Документальный проект
programme.desc: Свет одновременно материален и нематериален. Вечность – главная особенность света. Фотонам не свойственно стареть. Свет от далеких звезд идет до Земли миллионы лет и приходит неизменным. Человек видит окружающие предметы исключительно благодаря фотонам. Проведенные исследования породили еще одну версию возникновение мира, согласно которой мир создан из света и может быть вновь обращен в свет. Об этом и многом другом расскажет Документальный проект.

programme.title: Kur tas suns aprakts?
programme.desc: Žurnālists Māris Zanders ar diviem politiskās dzīves pazinējiem-ekspertiem pārspriež un ironizē par nedēļas politikas aktualitātēm Latvijā un pasaulē.

programme.title: Laiks mājai

programme.title: La Dolce Vita ar Roberto
programme.desc: Itālis Roberto Meloni kopā ar populāriem novadniekiem gatavo Latvijas novados iecienītākos ēdienus

programme.title: Pilna Bilde
programme.desc: Informatīvs raidījums mediju ekspertes Guntas Līdakas vadībā ar nozares profesionāļiem, kas palīdzēs saprast notiekošo mediju telpā.

programme.title: Cilvēks.Ceļš.Drošība
programme.desc: Tikai izglītota un zinoša sabiedrība ir pamats, lai ceļu satiksme būtu maksimāli droša.

programme.title: Globuss
programme.desc: Raidījums "Globuss" reizi nedēļā skaidro ārpolitikas un starptautiskās aktualitātes, no kurām izriet arī Latvijas politiskā, ekonomiskā, tautsaimniecības un kultūras pozīcija un pārmaiņas.

programme.title: La Dolce Vita ar Roberto
programme.desc: Itālis Roberto Meloni kopā ar populāriem novadniekiem gatavo Latvijas novados iecienītākos ēdienus

programme.title: Kur tas suns aprakts?

programme.title: Starp mums, dakteriem
programme.desc: Objektīva informācija par veselības nozari no vadošiem Latvijas ārstiem, saruna raidījumā "Starp mums, dakteriem" ar dr.Sergeju Šapovalovu.

programme.title: Būtu zinājis…
programme.desc: Daba lūdz, lai kļūstam pret apkārtējo vidi draudzīgāki un atbildīgāki.

programme.title: Pilna Bilde
programme.desc: Informatīvs raidījums mediju ekspertes Guntas Līdakas vadībā ar nozares profesionāļiem, kas palīdzēs saprast notiekošo mediju telpā.

programme.title: Nacionālo interešu klubs
programme.desc: Diskusijas par Latvijai un latviešiem svarīgām tēmām, tostarp notiekošo politikā un ekonomikā.

programme.title: Dr. Apinis
programme.desc: Par medicīnu kā par zinātni, praksi, pieredzi, empātiju, pārvaldību un mākslu. Dr. Pēteris Apinis sarunāsies ar Latvijas un pasaules medicīnas guru.

programme.title: Preses klubs
programme.desc: Diskusiju raidījums, kurā raidījuma vadītājs ar trim viesiem apspriež konkrētās dienas aktualitātes.

programme.title: Dienas personība
programme.desc: Raidījums, kurā katru darba dienu tiek aicināta kāda aktuāla personība attiecīgajam laikam, pilsētas aktualitātēm un notikumiem.

programme.title: Detention Adventure
programme.desc: With a similar premise to The Goonies and The Breakfast Club, Detention Adventure follows three nerdy friends and the school bully, who repeatedly get themselves thrown in detention. However, they have good reason to do this as they are trying to find the entrance to a secret maze of tunnels filled with hidden traps that protect the legendary laboratory of Alexander Graham Bell. Raign (Simone Miller), Joy (Alina Prijono), and Hulk (Jack Fulton) are the three whip-smart geeks who discover an old textbook which points them to Bell's lab, conveniently hidden beneath their school. The school bully, Brett (Tomaso Sanelli) a detention regular, soons joins them as they use all of their attributes to try to navigate through the labyrinth and find hidden passageways to lead them to their goal.

programme.title: Andy's Baby Animals
programme.desc: Incredible nature documentary series in which Andy Day, a famous English presenter, shows children a variety of baby animals from different locations around the world. Andy will tell you some interesting stories and you will have a chance to discover some surprising facts. Each episode is themed around a different behaviour that baby animals have to learn in order to survive, such as walking, climbing, jumping, swimming, eating, making friends, and many more important skills.

programme.title: History Hunters
programme.desc: History Hunters documentary series let young viewers explore past civilizations and cultures, their heritage and its influence on future generations. It is a fun way for both parents and kids to learn history and discover its mysterious facts and events. Various chapters of history are there for you: from exploration of Vikings, including their myths, alphabet and foods, to the Mayan civilization, the culture of Europe's wide-ranging clans of Celts and life in the islands in the Pacific Ocean known collectively as Polynesia, and much more.

programme.title: Science Max: Experiments at Large
programme.desc: Science Max: Experiments at Large is a Canadian children's TV series, hosted by Phil McCordic. The aim is to educate viewers about science through various experiments and to demonstrate main scientific principles in a fun and entertaining way. There is an interactive online component in the show, kids are welcome to interact with the host and ask him science questions. Kids will find out how gravity works, what polymers are, why boomerangs come back and much more. When it comes to scientific experiments, everything is large, as Phil likes to go bigger to make it more entertaining for the viewers.

programme.title: Horrible Histories
programme.desc: Re-telling history in a way you never have before, Horrible History shows the dark and gruesome aspects of British and other Western world history. Ranging from the Stone Age to post-World War II era, the show presents the history with several time periods in a single episode, with live action sketches and music videos intercut by animations and quizzes. Starring Matthew Baynton, Simon Farnaby, Martha Howe-Douglas, Jim Howick, Laurence Rickard, Sarah Hadland and Ben Willbond with a large supporting cast, this British children's live-action historical and musical sketch comedy is based on the bestselling books of the same name by Terry Deary, adapted for CBBC. Running from 2009 to 2013, Horrible Histories doesn't set out to educate younger audiences but instead popularise history and inspire curiosity for further investigation into history.

programme.title: Andy's Safari Adventures
programme.desc: In one of the biggest safari parks in the whole world there is Ranger Andy, who will go off in his truest mobile- buggy to fix the problem. He is not alone with help from his Boss, Mr Hammond and Tech superstar Jen who know everything about computer. They are here to help all of the animal from the small and cute to the big and scary that you wouldn't normally get too close to. Everyday there is a new problem that need solving by Andy all around the whole world. Come a long on this epic journey of Adventure and learning about your favourite animal along the way.

programme.title: MathXplosion
programme.desc: Mathemagician' Eric Leclerc shares secrets from the not-so-hidden world of math in this exciting, entertaining math-short series, proving math really is everywhere! In each episode, Eric illuminates the big ideas in primary math that children are already learning to do. From computation, to patterns in a number sequence, to shapes and space, and measurement, mathXplosion highlights how math is related and connected to things they see, know, and wonder about in their daily lives. mathXplosion aims to grow and foster a love of math in a fun, funny, and approachable way!

programme.title: The Planets
programme.desc: Join Professor Brian Cox as he explores the planets of our solar system in this fascinating and stunning, five-part documentary series. Brian traces our knowledge as a species of these giant, celestial bodies, examining each planet's story and makeup. He looks back at their existence over billions of years, revealing each planet's journey with dazzling cinematography and compelling detail. Whether it's the gargantuan size of Jupiter, the mysterious history of Saturn or the complexion of the four inner most planets, this series is informative and beautiful in equal measure.

programme.title: Gym Stars
programme.desc: Watch some of Britain's youngest gym stars at the top of their game. See loses and wins, injuries and successes and a team with some of the best strength and agility to represent their country worldwide. Go with the elite team to seem them aganist some of the best gymnasts in Europe in intense competitions using the pole vault and even trampolining. And look into the life of a gymnast behind the scenes and away from their professonal sport. The show will take you to visit the homes the gymnasts live in, the routines they do each day and their personal life away from their professional.

programme.title: It's My Party
programme.desc: From Diwali, the Hindu festival of lights to Hanukkah to Kwanzaa to Mexico's Day of the Dead, viewers are taken on a fascinating journey of discovery into different cultural celebrations seen from a kid's perspective. Each episode pairs up two kids who have never met; one acts as the party host introducing the other, their VIP guest, to their family's cultural celebration. The two newfound friends jump in feet first, exploring the origins and meaning behind the traditions, participating in a series of challenges and games linked to the food, fashion and festivities of the dynamic celebrations, which culminate in a lively performance by both kids.

programme.title: Baby Animals
programme.desc: Arctic foxes, sea otters, tamarin monkeys and red pandas are just some of the tiniest, cutest creatures featured in Baby Animals. With their big eyes and wobbly first steps, nature's newbies are irresistible. Watch how animals nurture their young as infant elephants, baby bison and rambunctious rhinos all eat, sleep and play their way to adulthood. Cuddly, clumsy and full of mischief, the babies of the animal kingdom certainly make up the wildest daycare you've ever seen.

programme.title: Wild But True With Robert Irwin
programme.desc: Wild But True is a fun and exciting biomimicry series that explores how nature and wildlife have influenced our modern day lives. Robert Irwin, our Wildlife Warrior and nature lover, teams up with Isabel Yamazaki, our resident scientist, to reveal how science has made mankind a true student of Mother Nature. In each episode, Robert and Isabel explore nature's amazing solutions for problems in the wild and reveal how humans use these blueprints to make the world greener, safer, more efficient and more fun for future generations.

programme.title: Science Max: Experiments at Large
programme.desc: Science Max: Experiments at Large is a Canadian children's TV series, hosted by Phil McCordic. The aim is to educate viewers about science through various experiments and to demonstrate main scientific principles in a fun and entertaining way. There is an interactive online component in the show, kids are welcome to interact with the host and ask him science questions. Kids will find out how gravity works, what polymers are, why boomerangs come back and much more. When it comes to scientific experiments, everything is large, as Phil likes to go bigger to make it more entertaining for the viewers.

programme.title: Andy's Prehistoric Adventures
programme.desc: Time-travelling and educational fun for kids. Andy works at the National Museum where he's responsible for the prehistoric exhibitions. He needs plenty of interesting items for his displays like dinosaur bones, feathers and things. Luckily for Andy, he has a time machine which means he can pop back to the prehistoric era, like the ice-age or the time of the dinosaurs and collect what he needs. Join Andy on his adventures back in time and learn about the creatures and beasts that lived on Earth millions of years ago. Starring Andy Day.

programme.title: Detention Adventure

programme.title: Xploration DIY Sci
programme.desc: Steve Spangler is an American television personality, author, science teacher and the host of Xploration DIY SCI show. Each episode is about a certain science concept strengthened by science experiments, so that theory and practice are integrated. Steve conducts his fun experiments using everyday items everybody can get, so anyone can be a scientist. Watch, have fun and learn about the power of pressure, power of gas, laws of inertia, how to make elephant toothpaste at home and much more.

programme.title: MathXplosion
programme.desc: Mathemagician' Eric Leclerc shares secrets from the not-so-hidden world of math in this exciting, entertaining math-short series, proving math really is everywhere! In each episode, Eric illuminates the big ideas in primary math that children are already learning to do. From computation, to patterns in a number sequence, to shapes and space, and measurement, mathXplosion highlights how math is related and connected to things they see, know, and wonder about in their daily lives. mathXplosion aims to grow and foster a love of math in a fun, funny, and approachable way!

programme.title: Junior Bake Off
programme.desc: This is a version of the Great British Bake Off, except in this series, the contestants are all aged between nine and fifteen years. They will compete over 15 episodes, trying to make the best bread, biscuits, and cake, all manner of baked goods, in fact. At the end of the 15 weeks, one of the twenty original contestants will be crowned the winner. But who has got what it takes? Comedian Harry Hill presents, with Liam Charles and Prue Leith as the judges. Each week, there will be a technical test, followed by a "Showstopper" round, in which contestants are encouraged to get creative and create more individual bakes, with little guidelines. In the technical, however, they have to follow a recipe and produce bakes in a more uniform manner.

programme.title: Andy's Safari Adventures
programme.desc: In one of the biggest safari parks in the whole world there is Ranger Andy, who will go off in his truest mobile- buggy to fix the problem. He is not alone with help from his Boss, Mr Hammond and Tech superstar Jen who know everything about computer. They are here to help all of the animal from the small and cute to the big and scary that you wouldn't normally get too close to. programme.title: Absolute Genius With Dick and Dom
programme.desc: Children's television, comedy legends, Dick an Dom study the work of a genius in history, and attempt to recreate their idea. Sometimes they use technological improvements, not previously available to said genius, in their lifetime to up the stakes and create an even more entertaining event. The duo are helped by science consultant, Fran Scott, and top experts in the scientific field. Series two won the 2014 Children's Presenter BAFTA Award, and hopes to engage young people to become interested in science.

programme.title: SmartMix
programme.desc: The smartest mix of the best music available through the night! Just turn it on!

programme.title: Čempionų kelias. "Vieningoji" krepšinio lyga. Maskvos srities "Khimki" – Maskvos CSKA
Čempionų kelias. "Vieningoji" krepšinio lyga. Maskvos srities "Khimki" – Maskvos CSKA
Penktasis kėlinys. Endesa krepšinio lygos apžvalga
Čempionų kelias. "Vieningoji" krepšinio lyga. Maskvos CSKA – Zieliona Guros "Zieliona Gura"
One Championship on TNT I. Mišrių kovos menų čempionatas
Rally Albania. CFMOTO Factory Racing Team pasirodymas varžybose
One Championship on TNT I. Mišrių kovos menų čempionatas
Copes garša
programme.desc: Cope ir hobijs, bauda, prieks, emociju gamma no veiksmes līdz neveiksmei un atkal otrādi. Tā ved ārpus mājas, dabā, tā sagādā piedzīvojumus vienatnē vai kopā ar draugiem, tā rosina sajūtas, atpūtina ķermeni un prātu un bagātina dzīves "garšu"! "Copes Garša" ir informatīvi izglītojošs raidījums internetā Youtube kanālā, Facebook profilā un makšķernieku foruma mājaslapā copeslietas.lv. Raidījuma "Copes Garša" mērķis ir ar makšķernieku sabiedrībā zināmu sportistu paraugu popularizēt makšķerēšanu kā mūsdienīga, aktīva un veselīga dzīvesveida sastāvdaļu un aizraujošu sporta aktivitāti, vienlaikus piesaistot attiecīgos speciālistus, informēt un izglītot Latvijas makšķerniekus, sevišķi jauno paaudzi, par atbildīgas, saimnieciskas, saudzīgas un ilgstpējīgas zivju resursu izmantošanas pamatprincipiem, dabas aizsardzību un līdzdalību tās resursu saglabāšanā un atjaunošanā.

programme.title: Pārbaudes spēle basketbolā sievietēm: Latvija – Somija
Ночная жизнь
programme.desc: Когда двум друзьям-барменам отказывают в кредите на открытие собственного ночного клуба, они пытаются найти другие способы достать деньги. После одной такой неудачной попытки местная мафия ставит им условие: вернуть кругленькую сумму к полудню следующего дня — или они покойники. По стечению обстоятельств именно на этот вечер у одного из друзей назначено свидание с девушкой его мечты, которое он никак не может отменить. Теперь два друга должны придумать, как не оставить девушку без внимания, при этом остаться в живых к полудню следующего дня.

programme.title: Bella Германия
programme.desc: Экранизация одноименной книги Даниэля Шпека. Cериал "Bella Germania" – это проникновенный рассказ об истории германо-итальянской семьи на протяжении нескольких поколений, начиная с германского "экономического чуда" и до настоящего времени.

programme.title: Библиотекарь 3: Проклятие иудовой чаши
programme.desc: Третья часть захватывающих приключений Флина Карсена, в которой Флину вновь предстоит спасти мир, но уже от угрожающего всеобщему спокойствию воскрешения Графа Дракулы. Находясь в отпуске, Флин знакомится с умопомрачительной красоткой Симоной, которая совершенно неожиданно для Флина узнает в нем Библиотекаря и обращается к нему за помощью. Вместе они пытаются опередить русского злодея в поисках Чаши Иуды, которая одна способна воскресить к жизни великого вампира.

programme.title: Ассистентка
programme.desc: Джейн мечтает о карьере продюсера. Она устраивается на работу в преуспевающую кинокомпанию в качестве помощницы владельца. Однако вместо радужных перспектив ее ждет мучительная офисная рутина, плохо скрываемая враждебность коллег и постоянные упреки шефа. Джейн закрывает глаза на все, что творится за закрытыми дверями начальственного кабинета. Ей приходится быть как все, но лишь до поры до времени.

programme.title: Вторая жизнь Уве
programme.desc: Уве – пожилой въедливый ворчун, достающий соседей вечными придирками. Он впадает в ярость при виде брошенного не туда мусора или неправильно припаркованной машины. И кроет на чем свет стоит легкомысленную семейку новосёлов, в которой папаша и гвоздя вбить не способен. Зато Уве умеет всё. В доме и в гараже у него всегда идеальный порядок. Как и в мыслях. Вот только жизнь давно перестала иметь для него смысл.

programme.title: Ночная жизнь
programme.desc: Когда двум друзьям-барменам отказывают в кредите на открытие собственного ночного клуба, они пытаются найти другие способы достать деньги. После одной такой неудачной попытки местная мафия ставит им условие: вернуть кругленькую сумму к полудню следующего дня — или они покойники. По стечению обстоятельств именно на этот вечер у одного из друзей назначено свидание с девушкой его мечты, которое он никак не может отменить. Теперь два друга должны придумать, как не оставить девушку без внимания, при этом остаться в живых к полудню следующего дня.

programme.title: Bella Германия
programme.desc: Экранизация одноименной книги Даниэля Шпека. Cериал "Bella Germania" – это проникновенный рассказ об истории германо-итальянской семьи на протяжении нескольких поколений, начиная с германского "экономического чуда" и до настоящего времени.

programme.title: Золотое путешествие Синдбада
programme.desc: О подвигах знаменитого морехода и искателя приключений Востока Синдбада сложено немало легенд. Перед вами — самая удивительная и захватывающая из них. В ней Синдбад становится обладателем золотой таблички, части магической карты, загадку которой он жаждет разгадать. На пути к цели герой и его команда встретит множество опасностей: шестирукую живую статую, гигантского грифона, одноглазого кентавра. Жестокие бури, великие чудеса, а также злая воля колдуна Кура, отметят собой странствие морехода. Какая же награда ждет героя в конце его славного, полного великих приключений пути?

programme.title: Пчелы делают мед
programme.desc: События разворачиваются в 1934 году на элитной вечеринке в честь Хэллоуина. Главная героиня по имени Хани, муж которой был убит ровно год назад, пытается воссоздать картину происшедшего, чтобы выяснить, кто именно виновен в смерти её супруга.

programme.title: Гавр
programme.desc: -Пьер Дарруссен, Элина Сало. Марсель Маркс, в прошлом богемный писатель, переселяется в портовый город Гавр и становится чистильщиком сапог. Занятие, хоть и не очень хлебное, дает Марселю ощущение пользы для людей. Поставив крест на своих писательских амбициях, Марсель вполне доволен жизнью, проводя ее между работой, домом и ближайшим кабаком. Но однажды судьба сталкивает его с ребенком-иммигрантом из Черной Африки, а жена Марселя Арлетти тяжело заболевает. И вновь Марсель оказывается перед холодной стеной равнодушия и пробует победить слепую государственную машину, надвигающуюся на ребенка-беженца. Оружие Марселя — только врожденный оптимизм и поддержка многочисленных друзей. Сможет ли он победить в этой неравной борьбе?..

programme.title: Семья
programme.desc: Драма, мелодрама, Италия, Франция. 1986 / Своеобразная частная хроника 20 века, история одной итальянской семьи с 1906 до 1986 года, любовные и житейские перипетии в жизни профессора литературы Карло. Кажется, почти ничего не происходит в старом семейном доме в Риме — течет обычная жизнь. Кто-то рождается, подрастает, сочетается браком, уходит на фронт, ищет работу, переживает личные неурядицы, включается в политические споры, вскоре вовсе о них позабыв, постепенно стареет, а потом взирает с недоумением на прошлое: а была ли жизнь?! И только многочисленные родственники, собравшиеся на 80-летие главы дома, запечатленные на очередной семейной фотографии, подтверждают своим присутствием, что с момента первого появления героя на экране еще в младенчестве прошло очень много лет — и сменилось несколько поколений.

programme.title: Bella Германия
programme.desc: Экранизация одноименной книги Даниэля Шпека. Cериал "Bella Germania" – это проникновенный рассказ об истории германо-итальянской семьи на протяжении нескольких поколений, начиная с германского "экономического чуда" и до настоящего времени.

programme.desc: Драма, мелодрама, Италия, Франция. 1986 / Своеобразная частная хроника 20 века, история одной итальянской семьи с 1906 до 1986 года, любовные и житейские перипетии в жизни профессора литературы Карло.
